Replying to @ChrisFerdinandi 2019-01-31 12:50

2019-01-31 12:12
Did you know that @netlify can build a preview of your site whenever you create a pull request? It lets you see the future! 🔭 Better than that, you can automatically get a link to that preview build posted directly into the pull request. See! 👇 https://t.co/QOuckqjrHC
